byline.original: By THEODORIC MEYER and JASON SLOTKIN

abstract: A new owner and no lease mean a longtime tenant has to move.
snippet: A new owner and no lease mean a longtime tenant has to move.
lead_paragraph: The tattoo parlor on the ground floor of the Chelsea Hotel was nearly empty on Saturday afternoon, and Ivan Arte, a worker there, said he had only one scheduled appointment, a man coming in to get a half-sleeve dragon with flowers.

headline.main: A Tattoo Parlor Prepares to Depart the Chelsea Hotel
